Fetch Data for a Participant

Source: R/data_SampleData.R
sample_FetchParticipantData.Rd

This is a sample function demonstrating the type of function the user will supply to find additional data about a given participant.

Usage

sample_FetchParticipantData(strSubjectID)

Arguments

strSubjectID

character A SubjectID of an individual participant.

Value

A list with elements metadata (a list of participant metadata) and metric_data (a named list, where the names are the available metric summaries, and the values are data frames containing the details).

See also

Other sample data: sample_dfAnalyticsInput, sample_dfBounds, sample_dfGroups, sample_dfMetrics, sample_dfResults

Examples

sample_FetchParticipantData("0008")
#> $metadata
#> $metadata$SubjectID
#> [1] "0008"
#> 
#> $metadata$enrolled
#> [1] "Y"
#> 
#> $metadata$study_start_date
#> [1] "2004-10-17"
#> 
#> $metadata$days_on_study
#> [1] 235
#> 
#> $metadata$treatment_start_date
#> [1] "2004-11-13"
#> 
#> $metadata$days_on_treatment
#> [1] 203
#> 
#> $metadata$age
#> [1] "49"
#> 
#> $metadata$sex
#> [1] "M"
#> 
#> $metadata$race
#> [1] "ASIAN"
#> 
#> $metadata$ethnicity
#> [1] "out of bound:Ethnic"
#> 
#>
